text: Simon Seferings (born 5 July 1995) is a German footballer who last played as a midfielder for 1860 Munich. ==Career== Seferings made his professional debut for 1860 Munich in the 3. Liga on 19 July 2019, starting in the home match against Preußen Münster before being substituted out at half-time for Dennis Dressel, which finished as a 1–1 draw. ==References== ==External links== * Profile at DFB.de * Profile at kicker.de * Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:People from Eschweiler Category:Footballers from North Rhine-Westphalia Category:German footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:FC Bayern Munich II players Category:SV Heimstetten players Category:TSV 1860 Munich II players Category:TSV 1860 Munich players Category:VfR Garching players Category:3. Liga players Category:Regionalliga players
title: Simon Seferings
